trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 承载的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewButtonColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that respond to simple user input.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewButtonColumn 类是特殊的类型的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>用于逻辑上承载的类的单元格响应简单的用户输入。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewButtonColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewButtonColumn 具有的关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>中每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>相交它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 每个单元格都提供类似于的用户界面 (UI)<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: To display the same button text for every cell, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> property to the desired button text.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示每个单元格的同一按钮文本，请设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>属性`true`并设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>属性设置为所需的按钮文本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此列类型的默认排序模式是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: To respond to user button clicks, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要响应用户单击按钮，处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the event handler, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether the click occurred in the button column.
trans-unit.target: 在事件处理程序中，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来确定按钮列中是否发生单击。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine whether the click occurred in a button cell and not on the column header.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性以确定单击发生在按钮单元格而不是在列标题。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>, and cell styles specified through properties such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时启用了可视样式，使用绘制按钮列中的按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>，和单元格样式属性可以通过指定服务如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>不起作用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"></xref>类为默认状态。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化通过设置以下属性的列。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性返回的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>属性。 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于创建新单元格的模板。

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>.
trans-unit.target: 为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>类初始化到新创建的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>此属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn>的构造函数

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响的列的现有单元格的用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 重新生成列后，这些更改才明显 (例如，通过对列进行排序或通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>列中的所有其他单元格建模之后。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property could not be cast to a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性。 无法将转换到指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: 创建此列的一个精确副本。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of button cells.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法可以复制按钮单元格一列。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，表示克隆<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列的默认单元格样式。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has an initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>返回此属性的初始<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>属性值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: This value overrides the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: 此值将重写中指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，但可能由其他单元格样式属性重写。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer> and cell styles specified through properties such as DefaultCellStyle have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时启用了可视样式，使用绘制按钮列中的按钮<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>并且通过如 DefaultCellStyle 属性中指定的单元格样式产生任何影响。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonRenderer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>作为默认样式应用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat-style appearance of the button cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列中的按钮单元格的平面样式外观。

trans-unit.source: The FlatStyle property specifies the appearance of the cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: FlatStyle 属性指定列中的单元格的外观。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the appearance of the buttons in the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>值，该值指示列中的按钮的外观。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default text displayed on the button cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在按钮单元格上显示的默认文本。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell> contained in the column that has as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property value of `true` displays the Text property value on the cell's button.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>作为列中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>属性值`true`单元格的按钮上显示的文本属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell>

trans-unit.source: If there is an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, changing this property refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有一个关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，更改此属性刷新列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the text.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，包含的文本。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性，则的值时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个描述该列的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>用于描述列。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*> property value is displayed as the button text for cells in this column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*>属性值显示为此列中的单元格的按钮文本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of a button cell is displayed as the text on the button.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>按钮的单元格显示为按钮上的文本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The UseColumnTextForButtonValue property allows you to either set the button text for each cell, or to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A> property value for all of the button cells.
trans-unit.target: UseColumnTextForButtonValue 属性可以是将设置按钮文本，对于每个单元格，也可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>按钮单元格的所有属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonCell.UseColumnTextForButtonValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.Text*> property value is displayed on buttons in the column; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue*> property value of each cell is displayed on its button.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<> *1> 列; 中的按钮上显示属性值<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果<> *1> 其按钮上显示每个单元格的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn.CellTemplate*>
